colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @039A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA THAMS CAD KYI MKHYEN BRTZE GCIG TU BSDUS PA'I NGO BO, LNGA BRGYA PA RNAMS KYI GTZUG GI NOR BU DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RJE BTZUN TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO NYID KYI RNAM PAR THAR MDO TZAM ZHIG BRJOD PA'I SGO NAS GSOL BA 'DEBS PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA 'DI NI, SNGA GONG NAS DGE SBYONG SDOM BRTZON MCHOG BZANG BA LA SOGS PA MANG PO ZHIG GIS NAN CHER BSKUL ZHING, PHYIS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN NYI MA SNYING POS YANG YANG BSKUL TE, RNAM THAR GYI SGO NAS GSOL 'DEBS PA SNYAN DANG GOS KYI BRDAS MA BCINGS PA'I GO BDE BAR BRJOD PA ZHIG GYIS ZHES GSUNG BA DANG BDAG NYID MCHOG TU DAD PAS KYANG NYE BAR BSKUL TE, RJE BTZUN BLA MA DE NYID KYI PADMO LA NYE BAR GTUGS PA'I BKA' @039B DRIN GYIS 'TSO BA, MANG DU THOS PA'I BTZUN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
